name: T-rex of fire
description:
What I'm about to play?

It's like the chorme game, but with guns!

You need to survive all the waves and  try kill the other cyber dinossaurs.

How do I play this?

E -> shot

Space bar -> Jump

How the game works?

Each wave passed, the game gets 4% faster and you win one life.

When you kill 20 enemies, you unlock the AK-47 and it gives double damage.

Who made this?

Made by Bruno Poór  and Anderson Vesgueber for the Retrograde Jam
